verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, when <S%G3753><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> had made an end <S%G5055><s%> <S%G5656><s%> of commanding <S%G1299><s%> <S%G5723><s%> his <S%G846><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>, he departed <S%G3327><s%> <S%G5627><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> <S%G5721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to preach <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5721><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> had heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the prison <S%G1201><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, he sent <S%G3992><s%> <S%G5660><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%>,

And said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> he that should come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> do we look <S%G4328><s%> <S%G5719><s%> for another <S%G2087><s%>?

Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and shew <S%G518><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> again <S%G518><s%> <S%G5657><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> ye do hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5719><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G991><s%> <S%G5719><s%>:

The blind <S%G5185><s%> receive their sight <S%G308><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the lame <S%G5560><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, the lepers <S%G3015><s%> are cleansed <S%G2511><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the deaf <S%G2974><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, the dead <S%G3498><s%> are raised up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the poor <S%G4434><s%> have the gospel preached to them <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5743><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> blessed <S%G3107><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> he, whosoever <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G4624><s%> not <S%G3362><s%> be offended <S%G4624><s%> <S%G5686><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5130><s%> they departed <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> began <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5721><s%> unto the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> went ye <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> out into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> to see <S%G2300><s%> <S%G5664><s%>? A reed <S%G2563><s%> shaken <S%G4531><s%> <S%G5746><s%> with <S%G5259><s%> the wind <S%G417><s%>?

But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> went ye out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> for to see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5629><s%>? A man <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G294><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> raiment <S%G2440><s%>? behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, they that wear <S%G5409><s%> <S%G5723><s%> soft <S%G3120><s%> clothing are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> kings <S%G935><s%>' houses <S%G3624><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> went ye out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5627><s%> for to see <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5629><s%>? A prophet <S%G4396><s%>? yea <S%G3483><s%>, I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> more <S%G4055><s%> than a prophet <S%G4396><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> he, of <S%G4012><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5769><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> send <S%G649><s%> <S%G5719><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> thee <S%G4675><s%>.

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, Among <S%G1722><s%> them that are born <S%G1084><s%> of women <S%G1135><s%> there hath <S%G1453><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> risen <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5769><s%> a greater than <S%G3187><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> the Immerser <S%G910><s%>: notwithstanding <S%G1161><s%> he that is least <S%G3398><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> greater than <S%G3187><s%> he <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> of Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> the Immerser <S%G910><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> suffereth violence <S%G971><s%> <S%G5743><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the violent <S%G973><s%> take <S%G726><s%> it <S%G846><s%> by force <S%G726><s%> <S%G5719><s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Torah <S%G3551><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> <S%G5656><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>.
He that hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> ears <S%G3775><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5721><s%>, let him hear <S%G191><s%> <S%G5720><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I liken <S%G3666><s%> <S%G5692><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%>? It is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto children <S%G3808><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the markets <S%G58><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> calling <S%G4377><s%> <S%G5723><s%> unto their <S%G846><s%> fellows <S%G2083><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, We have piped <S%G832><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G3738><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> danced <S%G3738><s%> <S%G5662><s%>; we have mourned <S%G2354><s%> <S%G5656><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G2875><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lamented <S%G2875><s%> <S%G5668><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> Yochanan <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5723><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> drinking <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, He hath <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a devil <S%G1140><s%>.

The Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> <S%G5723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drinking <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> gluttonous <S%G5314><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a winebibber <S%G3630><s%>, a friend <S%G5384><s%> of publicans <S%G5057><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinners <S%G268><s%>. But <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G5681><s%> of <S%G575><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> began he <S%G756><s%> <S%G5662><s%> to upbraid <S%G3679><s%> <S%G5721><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> most <S%G4118><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> mighty works <S%G1411><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they repented <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>:

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Chorazin <S%G5523><s%>! woe <S%G3759><s%> unto thee <S%G4671><s%>, Beit-TZaidah <S%G966><s%>! for <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty works <S%G1411><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> were done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, had been done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> TZor <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> TZidon <S%G4605><s%>, they would have repented <S%G3340><s%> <S%G5656><s%> long ago <S%G302><s%> <S%G3819><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ashes <S%G4700><s%>.

But <S%G4133><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, It shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> more tolerable <S%G414><s%> for TZor <S%G5184><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> TZidon <S%G4605><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for you <S%G5213><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%>, K'far-Nachum <S%G2584><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> art exalted <S%G5312><s%> <S%G5685><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, shalt be brought down <S%G2601><s%> <S%G5701><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> SH'ol <S%G86><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty works <S%G1411><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> have been done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, had been done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%>, it would have remained <S%G302><s%> <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5656><s%> until <S%G3360><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%>.

But <S%G4133><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> it shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G5704><s%> more tolerable <S%G414><s%> for the land <S%G1093><s%> of Sodom <S%G4670><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of judgment <S%G2920><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%>.

At <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, I thank <S%G1843><s%> <S%G5731><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>, O Father <S%G3962><s%>, YY <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> thou hast hid <S%G613><s%> <S%G5656><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the wise <S%G4680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prudent <S%G4908><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast revealed <S%G601><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto babes <S%G3516><s%>.
Havahn so <S%G3483><s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> it seemed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> good <S%G2107><s%> in thy <S%G4675><s%> sight <S%G1715><s%>.

All things <S%G3956><s%> are delivered <S%G3860><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> knoweth <S%G1921><s%> <S%G5719><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> knoweth <S%G1921><s%> <S%G5719><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, save <S%G1508><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%>, and he <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G3739><s%> whomsoever <S%G1437><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> will <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5741><s%> reveal <S%G601><s%> <S%G5658><s%> him.

Come <S%G1205><s%> <S%G5773><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> ye that labour <S%G2872><s%> <S%G5723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> are heavy laden <S%G5412><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, and I <S%G2504><s%> will give <S%G373><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> rest <S%G373><s%> <S%G5692><s%>.
